events.message: I ordered a jacket last week but it doesn’t fit at all, and I would like to request a refund for the purchase.
The issue has been categorized as Refund based on the customer's request for money back due to size issues.
This case has been assigned to agent Sarah Morgan for handling the refund request.
Hello! I’m Sarah, and I’ll assist you with your refund request for the jacket you ordered.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm if the jacket is unused and with original tags for processing the refund?
Thanks Sarah. My order number is 789456123, and yes, the jacket is still unused and all the tags are intact.
Thank you for the info. I will initiate the refund process immediately and send you a prepaid return label for the jacket.
Great, I appreciate your quick help. I will send the jacket back as soon as I get the label.
The refund has been completed successfully once we received the returned jacket. You should see the amount credited soon.
Just following up to ensure the refund has appeared in your account and that you’re satisfied with the resolution.
Closing this case now. Please feel free to contact us again if you have any other questions or concerns.
We have sent you a short survey about your experience to help us improve our service.
